data.body: China has discovered the largest gold deposit ever found in the country over the past seven decades, sitting on approximately 1,444 tonnes of gold. Lianing Geological and Mining Group’s 1,000 technicians and workers completed the find in just 15 days, and it comes as gold prices hit record highs. China’s Ministry of Natural Resources confirmed the discovery of the Dadonggou gold deposit on November 14.
